---
name: "Feature: Automation and Error Reduction"
about: "Automate data entry and validation to reduce user errors."
title: "[Feature] Automation and Error Reduction"
labels: [enhancement]
assignees: ''
---

## Problem
Manual data entry can lead to errors and inconsistencies.

## Proposal
- Add automation for data entry (e.g., auto-fill, validation, duplicate checking).
- Provide feedback and suggestions to users during signup.

## Benefits
- Fewer mistakes and better data quality.
- Improved user experience.

## Additional Context
Inspired by the Cover Letter Generator project.
